titles.title: To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to clarify the rates applicable to marketing assistance loans and loan deficiency payments for certain oilseeds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities and Risk Management
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 9/17/2002--Introduced. Amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to include crambe and sesame seeds within the definition of "other oilseeds."Itemizes such oilseeds and applies the same marketing assistance loan rate and the same loan deficiency payment rate to each of them.
